io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.World

  • Packages that use World 
    Package Description
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.particle
    A package for rendering particles.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.sky
    A package containing a system to render skys including parallax.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d
    An API that deals with 2d worlds.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.chunk
    A package for worlds using the chunk API.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.editor
    An editor for RPGOnline image worlds.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.entity
    The API for movable entities in the world API.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.img
    A package for worlds stored as images.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.net
    Network components for the world API.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.texture
    A package for tile textures.
    io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.texture.entity
    A package for entity textures.
